Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I have been using Claude to provide feedback on my writing in my PhD. I find that it is useful between seeing my supervisors. Then when I do see my supervisors, they can provide me with more meta-level feedback. Claude is really only useful on a paragraph level.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Both Claude and my supervisors are very kind to me. ChatGPT can be a little blunt, but I don't use it anyway.
